Summary: A UFO I filmed, very well, from Dam's Square in Amsterdam on New Year's 12/31/09.
divs: sighting detailsi was visiting the netherlands from the united states with a friend. to celebrate the new year while we were there, we headed to dam square with some friends. minutes before the clock struck midnight, i very easily saw a red\orange ufo that presented itself as a glowing orb of light. it's projection was steady and clear (as captured on film) for over 30 seconds as i traced it pass over us. the video is shot from a 10 mega pixel digital camera at high resolution with optimized exposure settings for the dark environment. i am a film student attending a private university and prefer to do my own white balancing, so to speak. i had my camera fine-tuned constantly to capture every detail of my trip in the netherlands, and my skill as a photographer paid off when i turned my lens past the fireworks on one of the most memorable nights of my life. eyes open, [witness name deleted\cms\tg]
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Amsterdam
There were no other sightings in Amsterdam on or around December 31st 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
